projectGridLines.title: Project details given in Description.
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1: Title: Publication Monitoring Tool

Description: This is a proprietary document monitoring tool that helps enhance efficiency in the clientâ€™s document procurement process. This tool scours several global stock exchanges and company websites using advanced multi-level crawling

Tech stack: Vue.js, Node.js, Python Programming, Postgresql, AWS

Expected Learning: Data ETL & Solutions

Specific Courses Required for Project Execution: Data Engineering

Project reference: https://www.sganalytics.com/esg-document-tracking-software/


Project 2: Intelligent Data Extraction & Tagging Tool (IDEAT)

Description: This is an AI-powered solution that streamlines data extraction & analysis from documents, enabling secondary research analysts to swiftly extract metrics & answers, with better accuracy and saves their time by minimizing manual processes

Tech Stack: Vue.js, Node.js, Python Programming, Data Science, In-house LLM, Postgresql, AWS

Expected Learning: Data Science & Solutions

Specific Courses Required for Project Execution: Data Science

Project reference: https://www.sganalytics.com/esg-data-management-software/
